reviews.review: 착짱죽짱

Fun game. Great with friends and alone. I feel like this has what left 4 dead 2 doesn't - I can't explain why! Active updates and extras and a LOT of people playing at the moment. Definitely recommend this game. Would be cool to have an in-game chat or party chat as this is cross platform so in some instances difficult to have all your pals in one place. 10/10

just shy of 100 hrs and I have come to find this game is one of the most garbage games I've ever invested my time into. In theory it's good, there is a killer and you run. easy enough. But when you play matches after the first thrill of fear that excitement you have after maybe a day or 2 starts to turn to rage and unhealthy environment... as a party game with only friends it's fine you can laugh an rage at each-other but as a public pvp this is one of the most stressful games in existence superseding even the infamous call of duty in terms of how it works on your nerves.

As much as I enjoyed the game's mechanics and when I played with friends, the general online experience I had was mostly bad, sometimes terrible. Perhaps it's that the game is heavily populated by folks who have hundreds and/or thousands of hours in it, and they no longer can have fun without engaging in 'trolling'. If you have friends to play with, it's still alright.

Since the patch on the morning of, Tuesday December 8th I've been having various server connectivity issues, and I keep getting queue penalties for it.

The game itself is fun but this has to be with the recent patch as *it never happened before this patch* Killers seem to be balanced to a way where it's less dependent on skill and more so on luck of generator spawns sometimes and the overall community of the game to me feels very trashy as it's filled with hackers, toxic players, and general scumbag human beings.

(To clarify this game is a wonderful game imo, however I'd suggest playing in customs with a group of friends as it's more entertaining that way in my experience.)

ДОСТОИНСТВА:
Постоянные обновления. Интересная суть игры. Хорошая графика. 
НЕДОСТАТКИ:
Слишком много платного контента. Много токсичных людей.
Познакомился с игрой 1 года назад и был доволен ей.Играл каждый день по несколько часов. Суть игры была просто бомбическая. Либо ты играешь за сурвов, которые должны сбежать, при это завести все генераторы. Либо ты играешь за маньяка, который должен убить всех выживших. Хочу сказать что игра не зависит от доната и донатить не обезательно,  но те кто хочет попробовать нового мана(маньяка) или сурва(выжившего) то думаю что придётся всё-таки задонатить так как за обычную валюту в виде радужных осколков вам придётся отыграть примерно часов так 70 и это только ради 1 сурва или 1 мана. Немного обидно что обычная валюта даётся только за лвл ап и больше ни как. В целом игра мне понравилась советую попробовать эту игру в особенности в компании друзей.

此游戏关于地图的各方面随机性较强，对萌新不太友好，得玩个几百个小时才能对地图有所记忆，加上配件、技能等等杂乱的东西加在一起，难度较高，也就是学习成本很高，一个人玩几乎坚持不下去。还有匹配机制问题，因为这个游戏玩的人很少，导致有时候匹配的对手和队友可能水平差距较大，简称带萌新、抓壮丁。同时四黑和单排的游戏体验和游戏结果天壤之别，对于屠夫玩家也是。在我看来，最好有人带着玩，玩到400小时，几乎就度过了萌新期，对于这个游戏已经有了大致充分的理解。如果能度过萌新阶段的话，这个游戏的可玩性、刺激感、PVP博弈性还是很强的，并且因为每场比赛的随机性较强，完善自己的技术是需要很久的，也就是比较耐玩。很可惜的是目前此游戏没有国服，需要加速器。

Great times are ahead whether it's playing killer or surviving with friends, the only downside is wait time to load in a lobby when playing as survivor. 
Solid 8.5/10

The game is really fun but toxic players can ruin the experience for newer players. My suggestion is to play wraith and work towards getting a better character.
a few killers I would recommend to buy for new player is the following:
The Legion, The Death-slinger, The Blight (you'd have to put work into that one) The Shape, The Nightmare, and The Trickster.
on The Trickster don't overdue the kunai's bc they do low damage and a annoying as HECK.

Always a fan favorite around Halloween time but after coming back to the game for a brief hiatus, I think will start routinely playing this game again.

Current state: 

Dogshit

Matchmaking is trash (even after some rebalancing and reworking)
Big part of the community is toxic (survivors teabagging constantly, tunneling/camping killers)
Genius idea of adding a leaverbuster which is just made very poorly (the game disconnected me for no reason while playing survivor even though my internet was completely fine [was on discord with a friend at the moment] and I literally got a leaver buster)

Game itself is fucking godlike and I love it, but if you are not godlike, have 600 apm, can moonwalk like a god or hit every huntress axe across the map, you are deemed trash by the community and get toxic responses.

Do
Not
Buy
This
Game
I wish I could Ezz Ezz Shadow box this game!
